definition: sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Learning Chinese Bracketing Knowledge Based on a Bilingual Language Model.
sentences.chinese: 基於雙語模型的漢語句法分析知識自動獲取。

sentences.english: In this paper, a trainable and fast partial parsing method for Chinese is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種可訓練的快速漢語部分句法分析方法。

sentences.english: Choosing the statistical model is the key problem in statistical parsing.
sentences.chinese: 統計模型的選擇是統計句法分析的關鍵。

sentences.english: Chunk parsing is an effective method to decrease the difficulty of language parsing.
sentences.chinese: 組塊分析是一種大大降低句法分析難度的有效手段。

sentences.english: Automatically recognizing predicate is one of the important research topics in shallow parsing.
sentences.chinese: 謂詞的自動識別是淺層句法分析的重要內容。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3
